hi! how do I uninstall nomoroka???: The standard process for uninstalling is through the software center, or if you want to use the command line, "sudo apt-get uninstall <packagename>"
Another thing is that different processes that manipulate packages (installing, uninstalling, etc) like Software Center, Synaptic, apt-get and aptitude all lock other programs out while they're open
So if you have any packages downloading, updating, or have software/center or synaptic open and you try to run a remove from somewhere else, it won't let you until the other process is done
